name: In For The Ride - GMTK Game Jam 2020 submission
name_original: In For The Ride - GMTK Game Jam 2020 submission
description:
You are strapped to an out of control robot in a strange facility. Escape to win!

Tookie was initially going to make a game by himself, but he couldn't think of anything. Instead, he helped me with the models, but I didn't use any decent models in my game so all I needed was a gun.
